title: Minecraft 基岩版 1.2 build 6 发布
author: cc7w
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-6-13 18:00 编辑 
测试版是Minecraft 基岩版的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。 然而，测试版主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的领域服务器不兼容，不提供支持。 Minecraft 基岩版1.2正式版 仍未发布， build 6为其第 6 个测试版 转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。  Fixes from Bugs in Beta:
修复beta版本的bug:
Custom skins work again!自定义皮肤又工作了Changed several graphics on the Recipe Book to improve navigation改变一些配方书的图片来改善使用Fixed multi-item placing in the inventory when holding right-click修复在持有物品时右键会放置出多个物品的bugHostile mobs will no longer spawn on top of glowstone blocks敌对怪物不会在萤石顶部生成了Water bottles can once again be placed on brewing stands when using Pocket UI使用携带版UI时水瓶能再次放置到酿造台上了Fixed an issue with scrolling in the skin picker修复在皮肤选择器中滚动滚轮时的问题Reassigned keys for Toggle Perspective now work切换透视再分配值现在可以工作了Empty armor indicators will now render on the armor tab of the Recipe Book空装备槽位现在也会在配方书的装甲栏渲染了Performance improvements for the Recipe Book配方书性能提升Craftable toggle now appears on all tabs of the Recipe Book in Survival mode生存模式下配方书的显示模式切换按钮现在出现在所有栏中了3 x 3 item recipes now appear in the Recipe Book but have a red background if they are not craftable3x3的合成配方现在也会显示在配方书中，但如果无法合成会显示红色背景3 x 3 crafting output items will now appear when in Creative mode3x3合成的终产物在创造模式下也会显示The crafting output box now shows how many of an item will be crafted in Survival mode合成输出盒子现在会展示在生存模式下多少物品能够合成Empty Locator Maps can now be crafted with the Recipe Book空的定位地图现在能够使用配方书合成Maps can now be removed from chests after world upgrades在世界更新之后箱子中的地图现在会被移除Pressing X while over the search bar will clear the search bar在搜索框中按X会清空搜索框Clouds and water no longer render in front of potion particles云和水不会在药水粒子效果前渲染Fixed a crash when entering the Storage screen修复进入存储界面崩溃的bugFixed a crash when opening Settings after downloading from the Store修复在进入市场后打开设置页面崩溃的bugFixed a crash that occurred when an item was dropped into the Recipe Book in Survival and another item was taken修复生存模式中一个物品放入配方书，一个物品取出，出现错误导致崩溃的bugFixed a crash after pressing Save & Quit after killing the Dragon in the End修复击杀末影龙后点击保存并退出崩溃的bugFixed world templates no redownloading after deleting until the game was restarted修复世界模板删除后，在不重启游戏之前不重新下载的bugUpdated the text for several How to Play screens更新游戏教程页面的内容The "Place" controller tip will now appear when holding a bed在持有床时放置控制提示会出现了Fixed Guardians not applying thorn damage when hit by melee attacks修复当守卫者被远程攻击时不会受伤的bugFixed fishing rod hook animation修复钓鱼竿动画Controller tips now disappear when Hide GUI is enabled在隐藏界面开启时控制提示消失Operators can now change a world's default game mode管理员能够改变世界的默认游戏模式After importing a template file, the game no longer needs to be restarted for it to show as an available template导入模板文件之后，要想显示可用的模板，游戏不需要重启了Adjusted font smoothing in menus调整菜单字体的平滑度Fixed the particle animation for End Rods修复末地烛的粒子效果动画Armor stands will now burn before being destroyed在被摧毁之前盔甲架现在会着火Armor stands will now change their pose based on the strength of redstone power they are receiving根据所接受的红石信号强度盔甲架现在会改变姿势Items will no longer drop from armor stands when broken in Creative mode在创造模式下摧毁盔甲架物品不会掉落了Fixed reward item always being grayed out on villager trading screen修复村民交易界面的物品总是有些灰的bugFixed the alignment of controller tips to no longer overlap the hotbar控制提示的直线性不会覆盖快捷栏Banners no longer show a checkered highlight when using a touch screen使用触屏模式旗帜不会展示为检查后的高度了Banners no longer appear as black in multiplayer多人模式下的旗帜不会是黑色了Fixed banners facing between south and west not dropping as items when the block they stood on was broken or moved by a piston修复面向南方和西方的旗帜在其下方的方块被破坏或被活塞推走时不作为物品掉落的bugGraphics settings will now be applied without having to reload the world不需要重载世界就可以直接应用光影设置了Buttons on host options will no longer change size选项的按钮不会改变大小了Horses will no longer take damage when adding a saddle for the first time after taming在驯服后第一次加上鞍的马不会受到伤害了Fixed an issue where witches could not use the 'spawn_entity' component with Add-Ons修复安装附加包后女巫不能使用生成实体生成的问题Hostile mobs wearing helmets will no longer burn briefly when they have died在戴头盔的敌对生物死亡之后不会在短时间内燃烧了Jumping, falling, and climbing stairs will no longer interfere with sprinting跳跃，摔落和爬楼梯不会影响疾跑了Improved messaging when using "/tickingarea remove_all" and there are no areas to remove改善使用"/tickingarea remove_all"命令时，没有区域可以移除的消息提示On the inventory screen, touching and dragging will now scroll without selecting an item slot在背包界面中，触摸或拖拽物品会在没有选择物品槽时滚动Fireworks will now give proper boost when using Elytra wings close to the ground使用滑翔翼几奖励落地时烟花现在会给予加成

Fixes from Bugs in Retail:
修复零售版本的bug:
Pressing the X button while over the hotbar will now clear its items in Creative mode在创造模式下在快捷栏按下X键现在会清空物品The Nether travel sound effect will now play when exiting a Nether portal在创建下界传送门时会播放音乐了Fixed text not translating after changing language settings until the game was restarted修复语言变更后需要重启游戏才能正常显示的问题Horses no longer clip through players when jumping… or did players clip through horses?马在跳跃时不会穿过玩家了，或者说玩家不会穿过马了？Redstone dust can now be placed on Sea Lanterns and Glowstone红石线可以放在海晶石和萤石上了The paper doll on the inventory screen no longer flips while using Elytra wings背包界面的纸玩偶在使用滑翔翼时不会镜面反转了Naturally spawned villagers will now have the full range of professions自然生成的村民会有所有的职业Using Carrot on a Stick to break blocks will no longer decrease its durability使用萝卜钓竿破坏方块不会减少耐久度了
 正版地址谷歌正版https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mojang.minecraftpe测试组https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.mojang.minecraftpePE官方博客https://feedback.minecraft.net/
